title: The Toys "R" Us Clearance Sales Are About to Begin. Here's Where to Find Them - Fortune
text:
By Chris Morris 10:31 AM EST 
Beleaguered retailer Toys “R” Us is about to pull the trigger on the store closings it announced last month. And that means bargain hunters are about to have a field day. 
The chain, which is shutting down 182 stores nationwide as a result of its bankruptcy , will begin going-out-of-business sales at most of those locations and promises “ deep discounts and deals .” USA Today reports the sales could start today at some locations. Toys “R” Us says it expects the closings to be complete by mid-April. 
CEO David Brandon announced the sales Tuesday , while emphasizing that the chain as a whole remains open for business. As part of its restructuring, he added, some Toys “R” Us and Babies “R” Us stores will be converted to co-branded stores to better compete against other retailers . 
“The actions we are taking are necessary to give us the best chance to emerge from our bankruptcy proceedings as a more viable and competitive company that will provide the level of service and experience you should expect from a market leader,” he wrote . 
Toys “R” Us originally listed 182 locations that were set to close. It has since removed some of those after renegotiating lease terms , but others might be added, given the company’s disappointing holiday sales. Here is a list of the Toys “R” Us stores the company originally announced would be closing:
